com.github.michaelbull.rs.bestiary

Class Bestiary

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.michaelbull.rs.bestiary.Bestiary

  • public final class Bestiary
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the RuneScape Bestiary API.
    See Also:
    Bestiary APIs

      • beastData

        public java.util.Optional<Beast> beastData(int beastId)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the a Beast by its id.
        Parameters:
        beastId - The id of the Beast.
        Returns:
        An Optional containing the Beast, or Optional.empty() if no Beast of that id was found.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
        See Also:
        Beast Data
